BackstoryDef.title: introvert
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wouldn’t even utter a word to [PAWN_possessive] own parents until the age of six; [PAWN_pronoun] was so shy and introverted that anyone who could coax a word out of [PAWN_objective] was considered to be very special.

BackstoryDef.title: urban faun
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of an urban life, and set out to live within a sprawling, human civilisation. [PAWN_pronoun] rummaged through dustbins and dined on curbside leftovers to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: unlikely bandit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found submerged in the river by a group of notorious bandits. Even they didn’t have the heart to neglect this young faun, and so rescued [PAWN_objective] and raised [PAWN_objective] to appreciate their cause.

BackstoryDef.title: saint
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following a tragic wildfire, [PAWN_nameDef] stood amongst the ashes of its destruction, barely, but still, breathing. Though futile, [PAWN_possessive] bravery in attempting to save the creatures of the forest made spectators see [PAWN_objective] a figure of peace. [PAWN_pronoun] was worshipped as a saint by the pacifist settlers of the forest, who would offer gifts to [PAWN_objective] in exchange for a blessings and guidance.

BackstoryDef.title: osteologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]’s unique admiration for the skeletal form lead [PAWN_objective] to become an osteologist. A mere pile of bones is enough for anatomical prodigy [PAWN_nameDef] to give a detailed profile on the diet, decent and health of their owners.

BackstoryDef.title: child psychologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ventured into the field of child psychology and conducted behavioural tests on willing families and their young to determine what makes children so…peculiar. While [PAWN_pronoun] enjoys [PAWN_possessive] work, [PAWN_nameDef], knowing what [PAWN_pronoun] knows now, is set on the notion of never having children for [PAWN_objective]self.

BackstoryDef.title: apiologist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sweeter than honey [PAWN_nameDef] had a penchant for bees, and worked as a melittologist. Unlike many in [PAWN_possessive] field, [PAWN_nameDef] studied bees in their natural habitats, and constructed an outdoor testing facility, which [PAWN_pronoun] dubbed the “laborapiary”.

BackstoryDef.title: charitable
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] siblings established a makeshift shelter for children of war. What [PAWN_pronoun] lacked domestic skills, [PAWN_nameDef] made up for in creative ones, and [PAWN_pronoun] would sing to the orphans every night; songs of love, compassion and new beginnings.
